channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Incumbent, the Marxist and the Heir: Sri Lanka’s Tight Race for President
item.description: The country will hold its first presidential election on Saturday since its strongman president fled the country two years ago. Here are the main cont...

item.title: McDonald’s has kept Europeans hooked despite its American appeal with its ever-changing menu of local foods and viral TikTok moments
item.description: Given its place in U.S. culture, McDonald’s European success might surprise some. But it's a product of the giant's deliberately curated local menus.

item.title: Video Released of NYPD Shooting on Brooklyn Subway That Wounded 4

item.title: With Focus Shifting to Lebanon, Some in Gaza Fear Cease-Fire Talks Will Be Sidelined
item.description: Even as Israel signals that it is moving its focus to its northern border with Lebanon, there has been no pause to its bombardment in Gaza, where resi...

item.title: 20% of French teens have never tasted alcohol—now wineries are making fuel for cars instead of boozy nights out
item.description: The decline in wine consumption in France since the 1970s is causing vineyards to search for different ways to use the surplus.

item.title: Nelson DeMille, Blockbuster Author Who Thrilled Millions, Dies at 81

item.title: Senior Hezbollah Leader Is Killed in Beirut in Israeli Airstrike
item.description: The attack, which Lebanese officials said killed at least 14 and injured more than 60, stoked fears Israel is driving toward a full-blown war on its n...

item.title: London’s most expensive homes are having a hard time finding new owners
item.description: There were 22% fewer sales above £10 million ($13.2 million) in the 12 months to July, compared with the same time period from 2022–23.

item.title: Motel 6 Is Sold to Oyo, an Indian Hotel Company Expanding in the U.S.
item.description: A roadside chain for more than 50 years, Motel 6 was owned by Blackstone, the private equity giant. Oyo will pay $525 million in an all-cash deal.
